name: Voxel Battle (Teams24)
description:
Poor guy "square" has to reach his destination very very far into the eternity. But these ugly humans have made his way as trickier as they can by laying all their trash in his way!

Save Square his time by helping him avoid the mess and killing it by shooting incinerating bullets!

Use arrow keys to navigate the path

Use Space bar to shoot incinerating bullets

Use F2 to restart the game

And use your agility to help Square dodge the mess!

Have fun!
